entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
